bind.value: _isEmptySlot ? ('empty_slot_' + _formationType) : isInBattle ? ('player_in_battle_' + _formationType + postfix) : _isWardog && isReady ? ('player_ready_' + _formationType + postfix) : !isCommander && !isReady ? ('player_not_ready_' + _formationType + postfix) : 'empty_slot_division'
